- The add-on crashes?
- The add-on stopped working?
- Have a feature request?

Please ask on https://tatsumoto.neocities.org/blog/join-our-community.html instead.

Don't forget to provide: 

1) OS name
2) OS version
3) Anki version
4) Logs
5) Screenshots, if applicable
